name: com.veguista.easing_toolkit
description:
This package provides tools for easing the movement, rotation, and scaling of Transforms in a procedural and configurable way.
It also provides tools to apply Easing Interpolations to the user's code.

samples.description: Contains a scene showcasing an array of different use cases of the SecondOrderTransform component.
Contains a scene showcasing all of the different Linear Eases that can be applied using the Easing class.
